metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000367 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description:
Todd Miller's sudo version 1.8.20 and earlier is vulnerable to an inputvalidation (embedded spaces) in the get_process_ttyname() functionresulting in information disclosure and command execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.9p5-1ubuntu1.4
sudo-ldap - 1.8.9p5-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sudo package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.9p5-1ubuntu1.4').
